pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 10, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, January 10, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with representatives of the Congress of Aboriginal Peoples.

Room 237C, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an important announcement.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery and are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office in advance. Media should arrive at the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 1:15 p.m.
  • Media contact:

Julie Rocheleau
Rideau Hall Press Office
613-998-7280
613-302-0249 (cell)
julie.rocheleau@gg.ca

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a media availability.

House of Commons Foyer, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage
